workspaces.label: Workspaces
workspaces.definition: A workspace is simply a folder inside which your pages are stored as plain text Markdown files.

tooltip.title: Move workspace folder
tooltip.description: Move the workspace folder to a different location on your computer.

tooltip.title: Remove from workspaces
tooltip.description: Remove from your workspaces but preserve the folder on your computer.

tooltip.title: Delete workspace folder
tooltip.description: Delete the workspace folder and all of its contents.

quickstart.label: Quickstart
quickstart.description: Create a new workspace in your Documents folder.

create.label: Create workspace
create.description: Create a new workspace anywhere on your computer.

name.label: Workspace name
name.helperText: This will be the name of the parent folder which contains the workspace contents.

error.missing: Please enter a name for your workspace.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Where would you like to put your new workspace?
location.selectedHelperText: Your new workspace will be created in:

error.missing: Please select a location for your workspace.
error.conflict: A folder of the same name already exists at that location.

open.label: Open workspace
open.description: Open an existing folder of Markdown files to use as a workspace.

error.conflict: The name "{{name}}" is already taken. Please chose a different name.
